# NSPopover.Behavior

**Enumeration**

The appearance and disappearance behavior of a popover.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Behavior
```

## Constants

- **NSPopover.Behavior.applicationDefined**: Your application assumes responsibility for closing the popover.
- **NSPopover.Behavior.transient**: The system will close the popover when the user interacts with a user interface element outside the popover.
- **NSPopover.Behavior.semitransient**: The system will close the popover when the user interacts with user interface elements in the window containing the popover’s positioning view.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **closeReasonUserInfoKey**: The `userInfo` key containing the reason for the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopover/willCloseNotification].
- **NSPopover.CloseReason**: Values that specify the reason for the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopover/willCloseNotification] notification.
- **NSPopover.Appearance**: The set of predefined appearances for a popover.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
